00002 ! Subroutine : HydrodynamicsF

00027 
00028  SUBROUTINE HydrodynamicsF
00029 
00030 ! Common Variables
00031  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00032  USE Domain
00033  USE FluidParams
00034  USE LBMParams
00035  IMPLICIT NONE
00036 
00037 ! Local Variables
00038  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00039  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: lapRho_f
00040 
00041 
00042  DO j = ylg_f, yug_f
00043    DO i = xlg_f, xug_f
00044 
00045 ! Identify first neighbors
00046      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00047      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00048      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00049      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00050 
00051 ! Gradient of the density rho
00052      gradRhoX_f(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho_f(ie,j ) - rho_f(iw,j ) ) + rho_f(ie,jn) &
00053                      - rho_f(iw,jn) + rho_f(ie,js) - rho_f(iw,js) )*inv12
00054 
00055      gradRhoY_f(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho_f(i ,jn) - rho_f(i ,js) ) + rho_f(ie,jn) &
00056                      - rho_f(ie,js) + rho_f(iw,jn) - rho_f(iw,js) )*inv12
00057    END DO
00058  END DO
00059 
00060 !---------- Calculate differential terms in the order parameter mesh (stress formulation) -----------------------------
00061  DO j = ylg2_f, yug2_f
00062    DO i = xlg2_f, xug2_f
00063 
00064 ! Identify first neighbors
00065      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00066      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00067      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00068      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00069 
00070 ! Laplacian of the density rho
00071      lapRho_f = 4.D0*( rho_f(ie,j ) + rho_f(iw,j ) + rho_f(i ,jn)            &
00072               + rho_f(i ,js) ) +  rho_f(ie,jn) + rho_f(ie,js) + rho_f(iw,jn) &
00073               + rho_f(iw,js) - 20.D0*rho_f(i,j)
00074 
00075 ! Define Psi
00076      psi_f(i,j) = beta4*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoStar )*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoL )*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoH ) &
00077                 - kappa_6*lapRho_f
00078 
00079    END DO
00080  END DO
00081 
00082  RETURN
00083  END SUBROUTINE HydrodynamicsF
